page.title: 17Local Survey (1)
page.content: We asked many families their likes and dislikes about our area. FAMILIES - Mainly 5-15 years residence Most liked the area, though there were some things they would change. LIKES 1) Convenience to all amenities 2) Close to the country 3) The people DISLIKES 1) Nothing 2) Building of houses 3) Traffic on the A6 ADDITIONS 1) A better park 2) Good social centre 3) Cycle paths 4) Shop 5) Tennis courts People who had lived in the area for a long time did not like the changes made by motorways, bypass and housing. CHILDREN LIKES- Shops, sports, friends DISLIKES- Main roads, no cycle paths.
